episodes.title: Inside The Dangerous Rise of A Modern-day Cult Leader
episodes.description:
In an age where belief systems collide with digital virality, Abdullah Hashem Aba al-Sadiq has emerged as a disturbing phenomenon—a self-proclaimed messiah whose explosive rise mirrors the dark playbooks of notorious cult leaders like Jim Jones and David Koresh. Claiming to be both the Islamic Mahdi and the rightful Pope, Abdullah has amassed hundreds of deeply committed followers, leveraging social media and apocalyptic narratives to cultivate absolute devotion.

This investigation delves into the sinister mechanisms behind Abdullah's influence: psychological manipulation, financial exploitation, isolation tactics, and alarming loyalty rituals—including blood oaths. We explore his transformation from an obscure filmmaker documenting cults to leading one himself, gathering followers who sell everything they own, abandoning their past lives in pursuit of a digital prophet promising salvation amid chaos.

Join MythVision as we peel back the layers of deception, examining how intelligent, earnest individuals fall under the spell of charismatic figures promising cosmic truth. Discover the shocking parallels between Abdullah's practices and historical tragedies, and learn vital strategies to protect yourself and others from becoming victims of modern-day cult manipulation.

Watch this critical exposé now, and stay vigilant against the subtle threats lurking behind charismatic digital saviors.

episodes.title: Uncovering the Deception of the Mormon Church | Shelise Ann Sola
episodes.description:
Uncovering the Deception of the Mormon Church | Shelise Ann Sola

Subscribe to @CultstoConsciousness 
https://www.youtube.com/@UCdruRz-kWtIBIzgURq05lzw 

Watch Shelise Interview Derek Lambert (MythVision) here
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Gr2awmwSk4&t=3664s

Here what Shelise says about her channel, 

"Hi!  I’m Shelise Ann Sola— former devout Mormon.  On C2C we dive deep into the nuance of culty organizations.  From Mormonism, FLDS Polygamy, Scientology, Ultra Orthodox, and Jehovah's Witnesses, to cults featured in popular docu-series, I interview cult experts, survivors, advocates, therapists, way-showers, authors, and more, to uncover how they find independence and healing through awareness and true individual sovereignty."
